mdRecord.dcterms:title: Suggestions for the Ladies Auxiliary of the Fire Dept.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Ladies Auxiliary Suggestions: Suggestions that a Ladies Auxiliary be made in the event that they be needed if there is an emergency and firemen are on duty and can't make a call, most likely associated with fire defense in early 1940s
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Fire departments
Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
